long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cuckoo for Coupon Deals

The FREE Cuckoo4Coupons App allows you to easily browse current in-store deals, online promo codes, discounts, freebies, coupon codes, giveaways and more that are posted on CuckooForCouponDeals.com.

Receive FREE hot deal alerts so you never miss the hottest deals, freebies & coupons.

After you download, click on the Main Menu, then click Weekly Contest to be entered to win a $25 Amazon card. This contest starts every Sunday, runs for 7 days, and you can enter once each week. Winners announced right on the app!

Download the FREE Cuckoo4Coupons app now so you never miss a deal!

Visit us at:
http://Cuckoo4Coupons.com
http://facebook.com/CuckooForCouponDeals
http://twitter.com/CuckooForDeals

*cuckoo for coupons
